summary: Tournament management web app with create, save, view, edit, and delete functionality for cricket tournaments
known_issues: Blank page issues occurring after deployments - may require Caffeine support investigation
Delete button shows error 'failed to delete tournament' for all tournaments - fixed in latest build
Tournament loading shows success message but doesn't populate data on tournament page

existing_features.title: Fix the tournament loading functionality in TournamentListDialog so that when a user loads a saved tournament from the Manage Tournament dialog, the tournament data (name, teams, groups, stages, advancement configurations) properly populates on the tournament setup page instead of staying on an empty/existing tournament page

new_feature_requests.summary: Fix tournament loading functionality to properly populate tournament data on the page when loading from saved tournaments

projectName: Add delete button with confirmation to tournament list
